about_the_game:
Dive into Postman Simulator, a relaxing simulation game where you take on the role of the new postman in a small, isolated town. Your mission? Manage the mail: sort it, deliver it, and ensure the smooth operation of the postal service in a calming and immersive environment.

Key Features:

  • Mail Sorting and Management: Organize and sort mail using interactive tools, following evolving sorting rules. Experience a mini-game inspired by Papers, Please to check addresses, postage, and other postal details.

  • Immersive Deliveries: Navigate the quaint streets of the town on foot or by bike to deliver mail to the correct mailboxes.

  • Progression and Upgrades: Develop your management skills with a progression system and unlock upgrades to make your work easier, such as an automated scale or faster sorting tools.

  • Subtle and Intriguing Storyline: Uncover secrets hidden in the town. Why did the previous postman disappear? What’s the true nature of this isolated place?

  • Endless Mode: Enjoy infinite gameplay sessions, allowing players to relax or take on challenges at their own pace.

Why Play Postman Simulator?

  • A Relaxing Experience: Perfect for players seeking a calming environment, the game blends a peaceful atmosphere with engaging mechanics.

  • Accessible Gameplay: Easy to pick up, but with depth that rewards attention to detail.

  • Distinctive Visual Identity: A unique art style that brings the town and its mysterious ambiance to life.

With Postman Simulator, immerse yourself in an experience that blends management, exploration, and discovery, designed to captivate all players—whether they’re fans of simulation games or curious about intriguing stories.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 1080p resolutions
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 or AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580 (4 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 1440p resolutions
